name: preferred-languages
description: Choose languages for displaying WordPress in, in order of preference.
author: swissspidy

scripts.uglifyjs: find js -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.min.js' -maxdepth 1 | while read FILE ; do uglifyjs "${FILE}" -o "${FILE%.js}.min.js" ; done
scripts.build:css: postcss css/src/preferred-languages.css -o css/preferred-languages.css && npm run rtlcss
scripts.build:js: babel js/src -d js && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch css/src --watch js/src -e css,js -x 'npm run build'
